basic_info.name: Why Choose Golden Golden Valley Integrated Campus - [GVIC]

Section.name: About GVIC
Section.description:
Golden Valley Integrated Campus - [GVIC] is situated in Chitoor in Andhra Pradesh. Its vision is to boost the quality of technical education according to the need. This institution believes in the shaping a youth’s life in the golden path. To create good engineers who in turn will help utilizing the resources in a better way. It has highly improved infrastructure with library, computer lab, hostel facility and hygienic canteens. It offers under-graduate, post graduate and diplomas in the field of engineering and Management.
Establishment Year
2009
Approval
All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE)
Campus Strength
1000
Total Placements in 2014
56
Total Faculty Members
100
How to Reach
11 kms from Madanapalle
